abstract: Fox tries an unusual promotional campaign involving Jonah Hill and a cell phone.
snippet: Fox tries an unusual promotional campaign involving Jonah Hill and a cell phone.
lead_paragraph: When it comes to publicizing movies, a lot of stars do as little as possible -- a perfunctory wave from a red carpet, a do-I-have-to-be-here chat with Jay Leno.

headline.main: Will Phone Stunt for 'The Sitter' Yield Right Numbers at Box Office?
